1080900.name: Jump King - Soundtrack
1080900.description:
This is the original soundtrack of Jump King, composed by talented musicians Nils Eklöf and Elias Thörnlund of Thörnlund & Eklöf Sound. It features 39 tracks (18 from the base game, 12 from New Babe+ and 9 from Ghost of the Babe) including bonus tracks that were not included in the game! To get the best experience with Jump King, and to avoid any spoilers - We recommend waiting until completing the game before listening to the soundtrack!

Track List Original

  • 1. Menu Theme
  • 2. Sewer
  • 3. Fallen King
  • 4. Dreeg's Theme
  • 5. Bad Vibe
  • 6. Despair
  • 7. Masse
  • 8. Sky Blue
  • 9. Coronation
  • 10. Sunrise
  • 11. At First Sight
  • 12. A Legend Lives On
  • 13. Jump King

Extras

  • 1. Menu Theme (8-bit)
  • 2. Alternative Theme
  • 3. Alchemist
  • 4. Coronation (Requiem)
  • 5. Jump King Choir

Track List New Babe+

  • 1. Forgotten woods
  • 2. Aurora
  • 3. Frozen Throne
  • 4. Plague
  • 5. Lost In Time
  • 6. Deep Roots
  • 7. Sanctum
  • 8. Afloat
  • 9. Toccata
  • 10. Moon
  • 11. One Love
  • 12. Fate

Track List Ghost of the Babe

  • 1. Philosopher's Forest
  • 2. The Bog
  • 3. Moulding Manor
  • 4. Bugstalk
  • 5. Nine Lives
  • 6. Phantom Finale
  • 7. Dreeg's Theme (DJ Gregorius Remix)
  • 8. Antumbra
  • 9. Journey's End
1080900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
